entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
